mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member( memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberEmail, memberGender, memberPhone, memberRegdate ) VALUES( #{memberId}, md5(#{memberPw}), #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberRegdate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_member WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND memberPw = md5(#{memberPw})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET memberPw = #{memberPw}, memberName = #{memberName}, memberEmail = #{memberEmail}, memberPhone = #{memberPhone} WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT memberId, memberName FROM tbl_member WHERE memberName = #{memberName} AND memberPhone = #{memberPhone}
